LanguageData.SMN_ChanceAlliesInterceptHack: Chance to intercept hacks against you per allied faction
LanguageData.SMN_ChanceAlliesInterceptHackDesc: Percent chance that allied factions will save you from a successful enemy hack, preventing damage and actually giving you security points. This is PER ALLY.
LanguageData.SMN_PointsGainedOnInterceptPercentage: Points gained when allies intercept as percentage of attack
LanguageData.SMN_PointsGainedOnInterceptPercentageDes: When an ally intercepts an attack against you, they donate security points to you. This controls what percentage of the raid points they give you.
LanguageData.SMN_EnemyHackAttackStrengthModifierDesc: Multiplicative modifier on how many hacking points enemy hacking incidents will have. Less than 100% reduces intensity, greater than 100% raises intensity.
LanguageData.SMN_PercentageOfValueUsedForRansoms: Percentage of item value demanded in ransom attack
LanguageData.SMN_receiveFullHackingAlert: Alert for hacking points exceeding 90% of capacity.
LanguageData.SMN_RetaliationChanceOnFailure: Chance the target faction will retaliate on a failed hack
LanguageData.SMN_MinHackSuccessChance: Minimum chance of a successful hack
LanguageData.SMN_MaxHackSuccessChance: Maximum chance of a successful hack
LanguageData.SMN_minGroupSizeForSurrogates: Number of members for faction groups to spawn with surrogates
LanguageData.SMN_minSurrogatePercentagePerLegalGroup: Minimum percentage of surrogates in legal groups [default 0%]
LanguageData.SMN_maxSurrogatePercentagePerLegalGroup: Maximum percentage of surrogates in legal groups [default 70%]
LanguageData.SMN_displaySurrogateControlIcon: Display floating icon above controlled surrogates.
LanguageData.SMN_receiveFullSkillAlert: Alert for skill points exceeding 90% of capacity.
LanguageData.SMN_skillPointInsertionRate: Amount of skill points used per insertion [default: 100]
LanguageData.SMN_skillPointConversionRate: Amount of base XP generated per skill point [default: 0.5]
LanguageData.SMN_passionSoftCap: Passion soft-cap before cost increases per passion [default: 8]
LanguageData.SMN_basePointsNeededForPassion: Base skill points needed per passion [default: 5000]
LanguageData.SMN_UploadingKills: Uploading to SkyMind turns the initiator's body into a blank.
LanguageData.SMN_UploadingPermakills: Uploading to SkyMind leaves the initiator's body completely useless and dead.
LanguageData.SMN_SkyMindOperationTimeRequired: Hours required to complete SkyMind operations [default: 24]
